Introduction to Generalised Linear Modelling using R Context

Introduction to Generalised Linear Modelling using R Deirdre Toher 2018 Context The aim of this document is to give an introduction to Generalised Linear Modelling (GLM) and in particular the use of the R statistical package to fit such models. The basic theory of GLM is presented and descriptions of some standard generalised linear models are given. The use of R is demonstrated through examples and practical exercises are left for you to complete, both in scheduled practicals and in your own time.
